annotations.normalized_text: Florida Defense Support Task Force Grant Program

text: Florida is the most military-friendly state in the nation & I’m pleased to announce over $722,000 to support community infrastructure projects at FL military installations through the Florida Defense Support Task Force Grant Program @EnterpriseFL. Info - https://t.co/YJOlzOiYAc
